name: Fred Perry T-Shirt With Crew Neck In Black
description: Cotton t-shirt by Fred Perry. Featuring a classic crew neck, short sleeves and laurel wreath embroidery to the chest.
additionalInfo: Body: 100% Cotton, Trim: 100% Polyester. SIZE & FIT Model's chest: 38”/97 cm Model is wearing: Size Medium

brand.name: Fred Perry
brand.description: Founded in the 1940’s by tennis superstar Fred Perry and adopted by the Mod scene in the 60’s; the Fred Perry label is synonymous with producing the iconic pique cotton polo shirt which now sits alongside a full range of clothing and accessories that captures the labels signature preppy style.

careInfo:
40 degree machine wash, do not use
bleach, do not tumble dry, warm 
iron, do not dry clean
